A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: If you have seen the episodes 4-6 you have seen episode 7-8. It is basically the same story with different actors. And Kylo Ren is the worlds worst villain. I have been calling him Darth Bieber he is so bad. The humor was misplaced\, Luke was a self absorbed whiny child and who the heck is Rose? This is one of the worst movies in the series.
